message.body: I went to bed early last night. . What did you need?
I was just gonna say they didn't have lavender in any brand and ask if gain original was fine
Yea that's fine. Saw it on table this morning
Got mri results back. ... Mri of neck was negative (nothing wrong)... mri of brain came up positive for white matter lesions (dead cells)

Dead areas effect the fruction of the brain. .. example frontal lobe controls memory and attention. So lesions there can cause my memory to be bad. .. parietal lobes (sides) control language. Could explain why I have been mixing up words. Like I been calling objects by wrong names
They said the parietal lobe? Which region in particular?
Causes of these lesions include concussions (neurologist said I had one) and inflammation of blood vessels in brain. I'm getting blood vessel scan tomorrow
My regions effected are right frontal lobe... back end of left frontal lobe.... and left parietal lobe
The back end of the frontal lobe could be broca's area, which affects speech production instead of comprehension. You have trouble understanding stuff? Or just producing
It has me freaked out right now
Okay. Did they say anything about it getting worse?

No bec I read the report myself and looked over it with one of our drs but they are only chiropractors. Don't know much about the brain. I see my neurologist the 18th. He will go over all my results with me then
